haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Lukas Westerman, Ltn Lukas Westerman
Fw Nikolaus Fechter, Fw Nikolaus Fechter
Fw Christian Welser, Fw Christian Welser

 The mission was flown from Pukov aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 11/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Lukas Westerman of FA 15.
Lukas Westerman and Erhard Kesselring were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 11/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Lukas Heffter were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 11/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Lukas Heffter were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 11/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Lukas Heffter were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 11/04/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Patrik Schorner of FA 15.
Patrik Schorner and Lukas Heffter were  flying a Roland C.IIa.
narrative: A last flight in my Roland before my trnsfer is to become reality.  We fly against attacking Russian troops.  I catch a group very much in the open and drop my bombs on them.  I then make several strafing runs before turning for home.   AAA is not intense this time.
